desc: Happy Eco started with two questions: Why do personal care products have so much plastic and what exactly are we putting in and on our bodies? These are the questions that inspire Happy Eco to create natural, healthy, and sustainable personal care products.

layout.text: Did you know that regular chewing gums contain
plastics and take hundred of years to break down?
It's kind of crazy when you think about it.
That's why we decided to create a natural
biodegradable chewing gum with a natural gum base.
